text_logic_form: Point $M$ is the midpoint of one of the legs of trapezoid $QRST$.
Point $P$ is the midpoint of one of the legs of trapezoid $QRST$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Point $M$ is the midpoint of one of the legs of trapezoid $QRST$.
Point $P$ is the midpoint of one of the legs of trapezoid $QRST$.
line_instances: The lines $MS$, $PM$, $QP$, $QR$, $QT$, $RM$, $RS$, $TP$, and $TS$ form the trapezoid $QRST$.
The lines $PM$ and $RS$ intersect at point $M$.
The lines $QP$ and $TS$ intersect at point $P$.
